name: Catstronauts (emilyblackman)
description:
A two player game (two xbox controllers required) where you try to make the evil monster chase your opponent instead of you by tagging them. But when the monster is already chasing your opponent, make sure you don't get tagged! 

Press A to dash and use the left analog stick to move.

Made with Ryan Swei and Walker Chilton (walkerchilton.itch.io) for Advanced Game Studio
